test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the authentication controller, covering scenarios including successful login, invalid credentials, and missing or incorrect input data.
The tests validate the account login functionality, covering scenarios including successful login, missing user ID or password, invalid credentials, and empty or absent JSON payloads.
The tests verify the account lockout controller's handling of login attempts, including successful login, login with locked account, unauthorized login attempt, and various invalid data scenarios.
